import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import {FormGroup, FormControl} from '@angular/forms' @Component({ selector: 'app-root', templateUrl: './app.component.html', styleUrls: ['./app.component.css'] }) export class AppComponent { form: FormGroup = new FormGroup({ description : new FormControl('') }) submit(){ console.log(this.form.value) } }
